pricing.name: Hourly rate
pricing.description: Suitable for getting acquainted with JetOffice service and for urgent tasks

preferences.name: Remote payments
preferences.description: Remote Payments is a service where Jet Office can pay your invoices without your involvement.

preferences.name: Deposit account
preferences.description: You can make a deposit, which we will use to pay your bills remotely or hire freelance specialists.

pricing.name: Personal
pricing.description: Best for individual use up to 5 people, small businesses and simple tasks

pricing.name: Startup
pricing.description: Best for businesses with up to 20 people and medium-complexity tasks.

preferences.name: Multi flow
preferences.description: Multi Flow is a service that allows administrative assistants to take on multiple tasks at the same time. Otherwise, the next task will be executed only after the previous task is completed or pending.

pricing.name: Business
pricing.description: Best for full-scale businesses operations with up to 80 employees and complex tasks
